Hi
     
      Yes, Heritrix wants to run a stylesheet(arcMetaheade=
rBody.xsl) 
against the xml order file to extract attributes such as operat=
or, 
user-agent, etc. So to solve 'Could not compile stylesheet' problem, 
=
I put the Heritrix-1.10.1.jar into classpath. Now I am able to crawl 
the s=
ite without no any problem. Thanks.

trix-1.10.1.jar. Actually I am 
using Heritrix source. I am directly compil=

and running it. I put all the lib\*.jar into class=

supplied with source. But now I dont have any Heritrix-X=
XX.jar. So 
what can I do ?

y.xsl" file directly.
